Content: My main connector in the front for headlights got burnt some how so I cut it off and spliced the new headligh into the main harness. I had high and low finally. Than I noticed my taillights don’t work. Can someone explain why, I thought it was a shorted wire so I switch one and now I got only low beam and now it’s dark. Gonna finish in the morning can someone help me understand
Title: Susuki gs wiring issue
Author: Bailey1207
